dict.string:
cat <

Help for the TODO bundle

The TODO bundle allows you to embed TODO, FIXME, or FIX ME comments in your source code. When you run the Show TODO list command, it collects these items and displays them as a list in an html window. Clicking on one of the items in the list brings you to the file and line where you noted the todo.

This simple list management system is helpful for leaving yourself notes as you are coding. for example

//TODO test this later 
//FIXME this is broken.

The serch for TODO, FIXME and FIX ME is case insensitive.

The TODO bundle does not rely on any environment variables.

EOF
